titles.title: Small Business Relief from Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2016
Small Business Relief from Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2016
To amend the Small Business Act to ensure small businesses affected by the onset of transmissible diseases are eligible for disaster relief.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Small Business Relief from Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2016
This bill amends the Small Business Act with respect to Small Business Administration disaster assistance to expand the definition of "disaster" to include the onset of transmissible diseases for which the federal government issues a public health advisory or declaration.
